editorialNotes.standard: A phenomenon from the start, Pok√©mon GO hasn‚Äôt stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Niantic‚Äôs groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

editorialNotes.standard: Loot lovers, rejoice! Swing swords and cast spells to extract treasure in this challenging RPG‚Äôs dangerous dungeons.

If you‚Äôve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It‚Äôs delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pok√©mon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you‚Äôre a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.

editorialNotes.standard: Ever wondered what life‚Äôs really like in the Fallout games‚Äô underground vaults? Experience all the challenges of running a post-apocalyptic community‚Äîfrom building gardens and power plants to playing matchmaker for your citizens. Eavesdropping on their goofy conversations never gets old, and an adorable art style √† la Fallout‚Äôs Pip-Boy cartoons will make series fans swoon. It‚Äôs not all lighthearted hijinks, though: Whether at home or exploring the Wasteland, your people will face raiders and other dangers.

A comic book fan‚Äôs dream, Marvel Strike Force lets you build the ultimate team of heroes and villains, then face enemy crews in breathtaking strategic battles. Can the Sinister Six withstand Human Torch‚Äôs supernova? Will Star-Lord‚Äôs dancing distract the X-Men long enough for Ultron to finish them off? Whether you‚Äôre braving deep story missions or buddying up in riveting Alliance Wars, you‚Äôll love playing with Marvel‚Äôs mightiest. Excelsior!

Elemental magic rules the land of Teyvat in the remarkable Genshin Impact‚Äîand as a powerful Traveler, you put this power to good use. Vibrant visual effects transform elemental blasts of fire, ice, and lightning into jaw-dropping spectacles. But it‚Äôs not just a looker: Genshin Impact‚Äôs beautiful open world is filled with thrilling quests and fascinating secrets. Climb mountains, cook meals, and soar through the skies as you search for your lost sibling‚Äîor simply get lost in Teyvat and see what happens.

ios.subtitle: The boss arrived in the office

editorialNotes.standard: Turns out that fighting Diablo Immortal‚Äôs monstrous hordes is a heavenly experience. The flashy, frenetic combat never fails to satisfy with touch controls and controllers, and discovering powerful gear can completely change play styles in amazing ways. Friends can help defeat demons in dungeons or, later, take the fight to other players in online battlegrounds. Whether we play for 10 minutes or an evening, the sheer variety of dungeons and challenges ensures we have a fiendishly good time in our pursuit of ultimate power.
